userInfo.name: Marcio Mendes
userInfo.about: I am a Frontend Developer with more than 3 years of experience working with Reactjs. In the last few years, I have worked in the e-commerce field, solving problems for thousands of users. I do a lot of side projects that help me to increase my skills and prove some new concepts. I am always looking for new technological challenges and building something for self-learning.

jobs.description: Must-have skills:  ↵ - 5+ years of experience in software development, ideally in a front-end role. ↵ - Proficiency in JavaScript, AngularJS 1.x, and jQuery. ↵ - Very good at dealing with many quirks of web-based APIs. ↵ - Unit testing and end-to-end testing using tools such as Jest, NightWatch, or Cypress. ↵ - Accessible web design experience (knowledge about WCAG-compliance and have worked with screen-reader tools such as JAWS). ↵ ↵  Nice-to-have skills:  ↵ - AWS, Shippable, Jenkins would all be great to know but not required ↵  ↵  IMPORTANT  ↵ - Candidates with verified English as ' Advanced ' or ' Fluent ' will be considered. ↵ ↵ If you got a friend who is a good fit for this role and it's not a VanHacker yet, you can recommend him/her to us!! And if your recommendation is hired, you'll receive $150CAD from VanHack!!! ↵ Use this link to get your referral personal link:  https://app.vanhack.com/New/#/referral .

We're looking for a Sr Data Engineer to join an awesome company from the Netherlands. ↵ ↵ Main requirements: ↵ ↵ 3+yrs of professional experience ↵ Hands-on programming experience with Python ↵ Experience working with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, Tensorflow and etc) ↵ Experienced in data pipelines + AI ↵ Great plus if you have worked with image processing and analysis ↵ ↵ ↵ - Candidates with verified English as 'Advanced' or 'Fluent' will be considered ↵ ↵ ↵ If you got a friend who is a good fit for this role and it's not a VanHacker yet, you can recommend him/her to us!! ↵ And if your recommendation is hired, you'll receive $150CAD from VanHack!! ↵ Use this link to get your referral personal link: https://app.vanhack.com/New/#/referral

If you're a great QA Engineer, please check this position and apply if you have: ↵ ↵ ↵ 4+yrs of professional experience in QA mainly ↵ Code review experience, performing tests and informing the team about bugs ↵ Automating tests implementation ↵ ↵ ↵  Big plus if you have experience with at least 1 programming language, AWS and mobile experience.  ↵ ↵ - Candidates with verified English as 'Advanced' or 'Fluent' will be considered ↵ ↵ ↵ If you got a friend who is a good fit for this role and it's not a VanHacker yet, you can recommend him/her to us!! ↵ And if your recommendation is hired, you'll receive $150CAD from VanHack!! ↵ Use this link to get your referral personal link: https://app.vanhack.com/New/#/referral

Must-have skills:  ↵ - 5+ years of experience working in software development, ideally most of it in a DevOps role. ↵ - Solid experience creating and maintaining AWS infrastructure using CloudFormation and Ansible. ↵ - Proficiency in writing scripts in Python, automating tasks, running database backup, as well as debugging and fixing scripts. ↵ - Solid experience working side by side with a dev team and adding features to improving a product, e.g. improving application logging, Docker containers, CI steps. ↵  ↵  IMPORTANT ↵ - A good score on the  Python  code challenge is desired. ↵ - Candidates with verified English as 'Advanced' or 'Fluent' will be considered ↵ ↵ ↵ If you got a friend who is a good fit for this role and it's not a VanHacker yet, you can recommend him/her to us!! ↵ And if your recommendation is hired, you'll receive $150CAD from VanHack!! ↵ Use this link to get your referral personal link: https://app.vanhack.com/New/#/referral
